altTitles.ja: 数字で救う! 弱小国家　電卓で戦争する方法を求めよ。ただし敵は剣と火薬で武装しているものとする。

altTitles.en: Saving with Numbers! A Small and Weak Nation
Survival Strategy Thinking with Game Theory for Save the Weak

description.en:
With tensions between the neighboring country rising signaling the presence of a war soon to begin, Soalla, the princess of a small country, worried whether her own country would be able to defend itself with its weak national power. The king was bedridden and the retainers who were her last rays of hope had nothing but the antiquated motto of battle honor in mind. Not one person had a concrete proposal to protect the country, leaving Soalla to wonder if this was where Favell would fall… However, it was then that Naoki appeared before her. A "magician," who would leave his name in history and possessed the power she desired to save the country.

---
**Original Web Publication:** [ComicWalker](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_MF02201046010000_68/), [Nico Nico](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/43120)

[Original Web Novel](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/1177354054886093335)
description.fr:
Tandis que les tensions entre pays voisins s’enveniment, faisant craindre à une guerre prochaine, Soalla, princesse du petit pays de Favell, s’inquiète de la capacité de celui-ci à se défendre, faible comme il est. Le Roi, malade, reste au lit et ses conseillers ne pensent qu’à l’honneur sur le champ de bataille. Personne n’a d’idée concrète pour sauver son pays, laissant Soalla compter les jours avant l’effrondrement de Favell… C’est à ce moment-là que Naoki apparut devant elle. Un « magicien, » qui laissa son nom dans l’histoire, possédant le pouvoir de sauver son pays.

---
**Publication originelle en ligne:** [ComicWalker](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_MF02201046010000_68/), [Nico Nico](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/43120)

[Roman en ligne originel](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/1177354054886093335)
description.pt:
Com as tensões entre o país vizinho aumentando, sinalizando a presença de uma guerra que logo começaria, Soalla, a princesa de um pequeno país, preocupada se seu próprio país seria capaz de se defender com seu fraco poder nacional. O rei estava acamado e os retentores que eram seus últimos raios de esperança não tinham em mente senão o lema antiquado da honra da batalha. Nem uma pessoa tinha uma proposta concreta para proteger o país, deixando Soalla a pensar se seria aqui que Favell cairia... No entanto, foi então que Naoki apareceu diante dela. Um "mágico", que deixou seu nome na história, que possuía o poder que ela desejava para salvar o país.

---
**Original Web Publication:** [ComicWalker](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_MF02201046010000_68/), [Nico Nico](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/43120)

[Original Web Novel](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/1177354054886093335)
